channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Peter’s Collaboration E-mails
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Peter’s Collaboration E-mails

item.title: CVE-2022-1761|2024-08-03T00:16:59.654Z -- unknown -- peter%E2%80%99s%20collaboration%20e-mails
item.description: The Peter’s Collaboration E-mails WordPress plugin through 2.2.0 is vulnerable to CSRF due to missing nonce checks. This allows the change of its settings, which can be used to lower the required user level, change texts, the used email address and more.
